WorkItem.Description:
Rawr is crashing when I try to optimize my shaman.
Â 
I am using a self compiled version of changeset 42820.  When I try to optimize I receive "System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection."
To reproduce:
Open Rawr and load my .xml
Go to optimize.
Check the override regem, override reenchant, food, elixer/flasks and mixology checkboxes.
Hit optimize.

Comments.Message:
Posted this, then had two thoughts.

In my .xml, a few of the available items have negative signs in them.  e.g. <AvailableItems>-13817</AvailableItems>.
Secondly, I did a few more tests and the error appears only if the elixer/flasks and mixology checkboxes are checked.
